game_description: A physic-simulation game about building giant stunt tracks in your home and collecting all the super looking toy cars. Build the stunt tracks of your dream, all in VR. Features: + Stunt track buildings, including turn, slope, curve, loop and wall riding (for cars). + Toy-car physics. + Cars and tracks collection. + Home environment such as bedroom, kitchen, living room, garage + Roller-coaster mode. Jump on your toy cars and cruise around the tracks you have builds. + Community levels. Create and share your builds with the community. + Explore over hundreds and growing number of community builds, ranging from driving test, highspeed crash test, to moon jumping.
review_1: It is exactly what it looks like, just a fun little car game with a hint of puzzle solving.
review_2: This game is very fun especially in sandbox mode.I get a infinite amount of the prices I own when I was a kid I used to make myself hotwheel tracks.I had a little amount of tracks so since there's a unlimited amount of tracks I can make big tracks and put them online so other people can try.If you love cars try this game over all this game is a 10/10 for me.
review_3: I played this game from full battery to dead which I usually don't do because I get bored of the game, but this game is so much more different. It's fun, it's challenging, and it just makes time fly by. There are so many things to build in the game and you aren't limited to it at all. That's what's nice about the game, once you complete the tutorial you have the whole game unlocked. You should definitely get the game if you like challenges or just like building rollercoasters.
review_4: The game is fun and relaxing and it's cool building stuff in sandbox and collecting cars
